projects.title: ShopTerrain & BHLDN
projects.description: As part of an agency team, I built the ShopTerrain and BHLDN storefronts using the Workarea platform. Customized themes and templates to align with unique needs and branding of each store. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth and successful launches. Developed and implemented e-commerce marketing campaigns using Workarea's tools and features. Assisted in troubleshooting and problem-solving for storefronts.

projects.title: Healthycell
projects.description: Built and maintained Healthycell.com on Shopify using a style guide-driven, component-based React build. Customized themes and templates to align with the brand's aesthetic and messaging. Implemented e-commerce marketing campaigns to promote the brand's unique nutrient delivery technologies, such as MICROGELâ„¢. Assisted in troubleshooting and problem-solving for store issues. Worked with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth operation of the store.

projects.title: BVA Commerce
projects.description: Built the BVA Commerce agency website using a style guide-driven, component-based React build with a Contentful CMS. Customized the website's theme and templates to align with the agency's branding and messaging. Worked with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth operation and maintenance of the website. Assisted in troubleshooting and problem-solving for website issues.
